title: version.sh should report version number in x.x.x format in its output
body:
What is the expected output?

iMac:go tjyang$ ./src/version.bash 
release.r60.3 10046 0.9.0
iMac:go tjyang$ 

What do you see instead?

iMac:go tjyang$ ./src/version.bash 
release.r60.3 10046
iMac:go tjyang$ 

Most open source tag their version number in the digit format of x.x.x 
please provide this number in the output of version.bash, it will be easier for down
stream software packager.

thanks
